Articles.Content: IM trying to install KW Rocketry mod and its not working. It says its for version 1.0.2 which would be a newer version, no? Im supposed to update automatically. Can I update manually?
Yes. Redownload KSP from the KSO store.

Yes. Redownload KSP from the KSO store.

How? It seems like i can only buy it again. Thank you

EDIT: I got it thank you

Edited May 21, 2015 by lowfan

Or you can run the patcher...

Which is most likely still broken.

Which is most likely still broken.

It was only broken for some people though. Still worth at least trying before a 600mb download.

Glad he got it to work! If in steam. I always just delete local content and redownload and install if I ever have issues.

600mb is like a minute download. Unless you are referencing people who have data caps. 600mb is laughable for a download. That is unless you are THAT restricted on HDD space or Network capability. 1Tb drives are super cheap these days. So are quality Wifi adapters.

It was only broken for some people though. Still worth at least trying before a 600mb download.
Edited May 21, 2015 by Ninjahgoblin
Or you could be like me, the ultimate scrub; only have internet at school or friends places, because your parents are stingy. It makes gaming fun and planning/research even more fun.
